data.title: Cam Jansen: The Mystery of the Stolen Diamonds for Mandarin Speakers
data.meta_description: This +130 page novel study is for teaching Cam Jansen #1: The Mystery of the Stolen Diamonds in English to Mandarin-speaking Chinese children. It is divided into eight sections, one for each chapter of the book, and includes everything you'll need to teach the book in a systematic way. Click the gre...
